## Use of KFAS in scientific papers and books

KFAS has been used in many scientific papers and books. Here is a collection of papers which mention KFAS. As the KFAS paper was not available for a long time, citation styles vary and the list has been collected manually from various sources. [Let me know](mailto:jouni.helske@jyu.fi) if you'd like your paper to be added on this page.
